articles.title: Strong demand for loans helps banks maintain robust credit growth in Q4 - Economic Times
articles.description: HDFC Bank Monday said its March-quarter advances climbed 17%, taking its total loan book to ₹16 lakh crore. The lender had a loan book of ₹13.66 lakh crore in the year-ago quarter. Provisional data also showed that total deposits expanded more than a fifth.
